onboarding.register: To start registration: you'll need PAN, Aadhaar (for e-KYC) or alternate address proof, bank details and a cancelled cheque. Registration typically takes 6-8 minutes. Would you like the registration page?
onboarding.kyc: KYC (Know Your Customer) verifies your identity and is mandatory for investing. You can do instant e-KYC with Aadhaar (OTP) or upload documents (24-48 hours). Which would you prefer?
onboarding.time: Most users complete registration in 6-8 minutes using Aadhaar e-KYC. Manual upload takes 24-48 hours for verification.

documents.pan: PAN is mandatory to invest. You only need the PAN number — not the physical card. If you don't have PAN, you can apply at the official PAN portals.
documents.aadhaar: Aadhaar is recommended for instant e-KYC. If you use Aadhaar e-KYC we'll request an OTP to your Aadhaar linked mobile. Aadhaar is not mandatory — manual KYC is available.
documents.list: Documents needed: PAN, Aadhaar (or other ID), address proof (utility bill/passport), bank details and cancelled cheque or bank statement. A passport photo is required for manual KYC.

quick_intents.forgot password: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow OTP instructions. If you don't receive OTP, check spam or contact support.
